results.name: a(n) = binomial(2*n,n) mod n.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: a(n) = Catalan(n) mod n. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Dec 13 2013
mathematica: Table[Mod[Binomial[2*n, n], n], {n, 1, 25}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 04 2017 *)
program: (PARI) { for (n = 1, 5000, write("b059288.txt", n, " ", binomial(2*n, n) % n); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 25 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 25 2001
